Unnamed: 4: Definition of Indirect Costs: If there are "Bible Translation" expenses beyond direct project expenses that are necessary to create the greatest progress toward the All-Access Goals, you may use up to 20% of the "Bible Translation" funds to support these indirect costs. The following areas are eligible for this exceptional use of funding: Field Engagement Expenses, Strategic Planning and Project Development, and Training and Development.

Definition of Assessments: If you choose to apply an assessment to this funding to support costs associated with the administration of your ministry, the assessment must be no greater than 15% in 2025. Dollars from any assessment of ETEN funding may only be used to support the following categories of expense: Administration, Fund Development, Marketing, Technology Support, and Resource Material.
